title: MNRE to launch Green Hydrogen Certification Scheme
description: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy has unveiled a draft proposal for India's Green Hydrogen Certification Scheme. The Bureau of Energy Efficiency will oversee the accreditation of agencies to monitor and certify green hydrogen projects. This scheme aims to provide guidelines for greenhouse gas emission calculations and establish a certification procedure.
